document_data.name: ''Star Stick''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Star Sticks''''' were [[enchanted]] items that could illuminate drakes with starlight.
document_data.Description: ''Star Sticks'' were small glass tubes, according to the manufacturer, filled with captured starlight.
document_data.Powers: These tubes need to be shaken and snapped to be activated. Once the glass was snapped, it magically returned to its original shape and illuminated the surroundings similarly to the effects of the ''[[continual flame]]'' spell. ''Star Sticks'' were single-use items.
document_data.Notable Users: *[[Xanda Pennywell]]: a weaver from the hamlet of [[Liam's Hold]] kept a ''Star Stick'' in her business papers-littered desk at home ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
